00007         enum FLOAT_TEST {LESS_THAN_FP,GREATER_THAN_FP,LESS_OR_CLOSE,GREATER_OR_CLOSE,CLOSE,NOT_CLOSE};
00008         template <class T = NoClass>
00010 
00021         class FloatCondition: public BehaviorTreeNode
00022         {
00023         public:
00025                 BEHAVIOR_STATUS execute(void* agent)
00026                 {
00027                         float objVal = getObjVal(agent);
00028                         bool status;
00029                         switch (test)
00030                         {
00031                         case LESS_THAN_FP:              status = (objVal < val) && !AlmostEqual2sComplement(objVal,val,ulps); break;
00032                         case GREATER_THAN_FP:   status = (objVal > val) && !AlmostEqual2sComplement(objVal,val,ulps); break;
00033                         case LESS_OR_CLOSE:             status = (objVal <= val)|| AlmostEqual2sComplement(objVal,val,ulps); break;
00034                         case GREATER_OR_CLOSE:  status = (objVal >= val)|| AlmostEqual2sComplement(objVal,val,ulps); break;
00035                         case CLOSE:                             status = AlmostEqual2sComplement(objVal,val,ulps); break;
00036                         case NOT_CLOSE:                 status = !AlmostEqual2sComplement(objVal,val,ulps); break;
00037                         }
00038 
00039                         if (status)
00040                                 return BT_SUCCESS;
00041                         else
00042                                 return BT_FAILURE;
00043                 };
00044 
00045                 void init(void* agent)
00046                 {
00047                 };

00055                 {
00056                         test = _test;
00057                         val = _val;

00059                 }

00092                 float getObjVal(void* agent)

00095                         return (obj->*func)();
